\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 64403}

\subsection*{Mellowed Us Out}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Lavender}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   &  & Cocaine & powder / crystals\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 2 shots & oral & Alcohol - Hard & liquid\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 2 glasses & oral & Alcohol - Beer/Wine & liquid\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 115.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
During our night of partying we realized we had no ganja! We had consumed a considerable amount of cocaine. I had two shots and two glasses of champagne. I had just bought a lavendar plant a few days before. My friend suggested smoking it for some odd ball reason, and silly me I was so down to try! We all had small snaps out of our bong. It tasted delightful, a delicious after taste. I wasn't really sure of the effects but everyone agreed that it mellowed us out.

\end{document}
